segments.text: I see the girl reaching out her hand, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking so much just to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is too distracted to notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor slippery, and no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids are used to doing things like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so focused on her task, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to hurt himself, and the girl is just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for them, but they really shouldn’t be doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR
